SAMPLE READING NOTES
TOPIC: implementation of piecework wage system (payment based on pieces produced) at car frame manufacturer in early 1980s
expected results from system:
increase in productivity (because pay based on number of pieces produced)
increase in morale (because of increase in pay)
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE LISTENING NOTES
TOPIC: long-term results that challenge the system
actual results from system:
tremendous decrease in quality of car frames produced (20% required repairs)
need to replace piecework wage system with different system (3% required repairs)
